response.summary: Chemical engineer, currently doing a master’s degree in Biodiversity Conservation at the University of Huelva in Spain. High level of English and Portuguese and intermediate German. With skills in Geographic Information Systems, Remote Sensing and R statistical software. Previous experience in the commercial sector, by participating in the sales processes of projects from different industrial sectors such as oil & gas, energy transition, chemicals, and mining. With analytical thinking, results orientation, attention to detail, and teamwork.
response.skills: Geographic Information Systems (GIS), Remote Sensing, R (Programming Language), Census, Environmental Impact Assessment, Biodiversity, Technical Sales, supplier representation, incoterm, Business Strategy, Proposal Preparation, Technical Translation, Formatting Documents, Sales Processes, Sustainability, Project Management, Agile Methodologies, English, Microsoft Office, Análisis de datos

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the following tasks:
-Creation of tender proposals drafts, working along with other territories inside sales personnel
-Searching for projects or company information to give support in the sales process
-Preparing experience lists and project profiles
-Formatting and translating Worley's professional CVs to be included in tenders’ proposals.
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Associate

profile_positions.description:
Represented suppliers of the cement and mining industry to attend to the needs of clients in Colombia, Ecuador, and the Dominican Republic. I developed the following activities:
-Identifying new markets and customer leads
-Developing strategies to increase sales volume
-Following up on presented oﬀers by e-mail or phone calls
-Visiting cement and mining plants to strengthen relations with customer leads
-Accompany and support foreign suppliers in their technical and commercial visits
-Helping in translation from English to Spanish and vice versa in situations of technical training or bids presentations
-Supporting after-sales logistics. Incoterm’s knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Technical Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Worked on the project: Development of PVC foam at a laboratory and pilot scale for its application in the Mexican automotive industry. I was responsible for the following activities:
- Research of the state of the art, experimental design, laboratory and pilot tests
- Organizing and documenting the final results for the future technological transfer of the process.
Achievements:
- Found optimal conditions of the process and developed a reproducible experiment to continue the technological transfer of the process.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant - Internship

profile_positions.description:
Support for the project: Test for the biofilm forming potential of Lactobacillus brevis species, found at the bottling plant of the Weihenstephan brewery:
- Microbiology tests
- Spectrophotometric measurements 
- Statistic data analysis.
Achievements:
 - Identified the types of beer with the highest risk of spoilage, caused by the biofilm formed in the storage bottles.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant - Internship

education.field_of_study: TUM School of Life Sciences Weihenstephan

company.name: Worley
company.description:
Worley is a leading global provider of professional services in the energy, chemicals and resources sectors. We partner with our customers to address their most critical challenges at every stage of their projects: from initial concepts to sustaining and enhancing their assets. And we provide smarter, bolder solutions while delivering on our own sustainability commitments.

We are 51,000 bright minds across 46 countries all driven by a common purpose – delivering a more sustainable world. While working to fulfill our ambition to be recognized globally as a leader in sustainability solutions.
